greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Large denominators of Bernoulli numbers. Mix A002445, 2*A141421 .
comment: b(n)=a(2n+1)/a(2n) =2,4,48,2880,241920,145152,= 2*(1,2,24,1440,=1,2*A141421). Among other denominators, A027642,A141056,A164020. 2*A141421 is second bisection of A091137 which is linked to Bernoulli via A027760. See A160014,von Staudt-Clausen theorem.
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Sep 28 2009
